Please add tips to the subpages, rather than the article below.

Advanced data
Item ID453

Coal can be mined at level 30 Mining providing 50 Mining experience. After a coal rock is mined, it will take 30 seconds until it reappears. Coal is required to smelt all ores above iron (other than gold or silver), in increasing amounts.

Members can store 27 pieces of coal in one inventory space by using a coal bag, obtained from Prospector Percy's Nugget Shop for 100 golden nuggets at Motherlode Mine.

Wearing either mining gloves or expert mining gloves grants a 40% chance for the rock to not deplete upon mining coal, allowing you to mine an additional coal before depleting.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Coal is not an ore; ore requires extraction to obtain the element, whereas coal is found in its usable form.

[[File:Coal detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Coal''' can be mined at level 30 [[Mining]] providing 50 Mining experience. After a [[coal rock]] is mined, it will take 30 seconds until it reappears. Coal is required to smelt all ores above iron (other than [[Gold ore|gold]] or [[Silver ore|silver]]), in increasing amounts. 

[[Members]] can store 27 pieces of coal in one inventory space by using a [[coal bag]], obtained from [[Prospector Percy's Nugget Shop]] for 100 [[golden nugget]]s at [[Motherlode Mine]].

Wearing either [[mining gloves]] or [[expert mining gloves]] grants a 40% chance for the rock to not deplete upon mining coal, allowing you to mine an additional coal before depleting.
